description: Message that gets sent out when the device start a shutdown or reboot process
title: Shutdown and reboot message

message_type.description: A fixed string showing this is a reboot or a shutdown message

topic.description: Source-specific topic ID used for filtering messages at the receiver side

source_id.description: ID of the source which identifies the emitter of the event

creation_timestamp.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating when the message was created
